basics.name: Joseph Richardson
basics.label: Software Support Consultant specialising in HR systems and SQL
basics.summary:
Support Analyst with experience with Microsoft SQL Server, SQL database and queries, Linux (Debian/Ubuntu) and Windows (Desktop/Server) OS environments, product implementation & support, troubleshooting techniques and Crystal Report writing.
6 years experience supporting HR systems.
Experience in both Corporate and Personal support.

work.summary:
As a member of the EMEA Support team I provide application and business support for all segments of the main CR IMS product including front-end, middle-tier, back-end and 3rd party integration.
Internally I’ve also produced tools for managing test environments and a number of PowerShell and SQL scripts for automating some tasks.
We also provide reciprocal internal support to colleagues in other teams.

As a member of the support team I provided both front- and back-end support for our main Time and Attendance/Reporting product offerings as well as legacy software. Additional duties included assisting the Consultant Team and Relief Cover/Assistance for the Local IT team.

Provided support and training to both clients and internal teams.
I built a solid relationship with many of our frequent callers and was often been named in positive client feedback.

Provided support to clients for both our own and partners' HR, Expense and Recruiting software packages.
I also provided second line support where required.

Training new staff
Building display equipment/furniture
Basic shop maintenance
Taking in deliveries
In-store repairs on Customers' equipment, as well as the loan equipment
Floor sales
End-of-Day procedures, including cashing-up

Customer Relations, including Sales and Complaints
Taking in deliveries
Cashing-up
Stock audits

Floor sales
Taking in deliveries
Stock checks
Building and maintaining equipment/furniture (client and display)
Provision of care and activities for children with learning difficulties and their siblings on Saturdays.

volunteer.summary: Provision of care and activities for children with learning difficulties and their siblings on Saturdays.

interests.name: Photography
interests.summary: Photography is a hobby of mine; I’m certainly an amateur but I enjoy exploring new places (a camera is a great excuse) and experimenting with post-production techniques.

interests.name: Tabletop Role-Playing Games
interests.summary: Several times a week I also play D&D with friends, both as a player and occasionally as a GM. I’ve found that the critical thinking and team skills that I’ve learned during my career have proven surprisingly useful within the game – there is often limited information and time in order to make decisions that will affect both a single character and the party as a whole.

references.name: Crystal Kayne
references.reference: Working with Joe was a pleasure - his in-depth knowledge of the application made him an integral asset to the team and he was always ready to teach and to learn. One of the friendliest and hardworking people I know.

references.name: Tim Hopkins
references.reference: Jo was a pleasure to work with, he has a real focus on the client's satisfaction and is more than capable of taking on complex technical problems when required. Would definitely recommend.

projects.name: jgdr20.com
projects.summary: Ongoing development of the static site jgdr20.com to record game notes, photos etc.
